response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be well above the market average. Considering its exceptional quality and potential impact on your endeavors, we are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 750000}
